name: The Old New Thing Classic Style
description: An approximation of the original style used on Raymond Chen's "The Old New Thing" blog.
additional_info:
Also fixes two bugs in mobile mode - clicking on the blog title at the top of the page now takes you back to the overview, and comment indentation has been reduced to minimise the incidence of comments squashed up against the display border.

Parts of the CSS are directly lifted from Raymond's original stylesheet via the Internet Archive.
